MEANINGS.DEF_EN: An optical disc storage format, standardized in 1993, that stores digital video (MPEG-1 compression) and audio, generally superseded by DVD and Blu-ray.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一种光学光盘存储格式，于1993年标准化，用于存储数字视频（MPEG-1压缩）和音频，通常已被DVD和蓝光取代。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The quality of the movie on the VCD was noticeably lower than the modern streaming version.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: VCD上的电影质量明显低于现代流媒体版本。
